ValidationRule.description: Validates that the ContactPhone field contains only valid phone number characters and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ContactPhone)), OR( LEN(ContactPhone) < 7, LEN(ContactPhone) > 40, NOT(REGEX(ContactPhone, "^[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\+\\.]+$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contact phone number must be between 7 and 40 characters and contain only digits, spaces, hyphens, parentheses, plus signs, or periods.
